name: Bicep Curl
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart holding a dumbbell in each hand.
Curl the weights while contracting your biceps.
Slowly lower the weights back to the starting position.

name: Hammer Curl
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart holding a dumbbell in each hand with palms facing your torso.
Curl the weights while keeping your palms facing each other.
Slowly lower the weights back to the starting position.

name: Tricep Dips
instructions: Position your hands shoulder-width apart on a bench or stable surface.
Extend your legs out in front of you.
Lower your body by bending your elbows until they are at a 90-degree angle.
Push back up to the starting position.

name: Skull Crushers
instructions: Lie on a bench with a barbell or EZ curl bar.
Extend your arms straight up.
Lower the bar towards your forehead by bending your elbows.
Extend your arms back to the starting position.

name: Tricep Extensions
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart holding a dumbbell with both hands above your head.
Lower the dumbbell behind your head by bending your elbows.
Extend your arms back to the starting position.

name: Preacher Curl
instructions: Sit on a preacher bench with your upper arms resting on the pad.
Hold a barbell or EZ curl bar with an underhand grip.
Curl the weight towards your shoulders.
Lower the weight back to the starting position.

name: Concentration Curl
instructions: Sit on a bench with your legs spread.
Hold a dumbbell in one hand and rest your elbow on the inside of your thigh.
Curl the weight towards your shoulder.
Lower the weight back to the starting position.

name: Cable Tricep Pushdown
instructions: Stand facing a cable machine with a rope or straight bar attachment.
Grab the attachment with an overhand grip.
Push the attachment down until your arms are fully extended.
Slowly return to the starting position.

name: Reverse Curl
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart holding a barbell with an overhand grip.
Curl the weight towards your shoulders.
Slowly lower the weight back to the starting position.

name: Overhead Cable Curl
instructions: Stand in the middle of a cable machine with handles attached to the upper pulleys.
Hold the handles with an underhand grip and extend your arms out to the sides.
Curl the handles towards your head, then slowly return to the starting position.

name: Close-Grip Bench Press
instructions: Lie on a bench with feet flat on the ground.
Hold a barbell with a grip narrower than shoulder-width.
Lower the barbell to your chest, then push it back up to the starting position.

name: EZ Bar Curl
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart holding an EZ bar with an underhand grip.
Curl the bar towards your shoulders.
Slowly lower the bar back to the starting position.

name: Dumbbell Kickback
instructions: Place one knee and hand on a bench for support.
Hold a dumbbell in the opposite hand.
Extend your arm straight back, then return to the starting position.

name: Zottman Curl
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart holding a dumbbell in each hand.
Curl the weights with palms facing up.
Rotate your wrists at the top so palms face down, then lower the weights back to the starting position.

name: Cable Rope Overhead Tricep Extension
instructions: Stand facing away from a cable machine with a rope attachment.
Grab the rope with both hands and extend your arms overhead.
Lower the rope behind your head by bending your elbows.
Extend your arms back to the starting position.

name: Pull-Up
instructions: Grab the pull-up bar with palms facing away from you.
Pull your body up until your chin is above the bar.
Lower yourself back to the starting position.

name: Assisted Pull-Up
instructions: Use an assisted pull-up machine or resistance bands to support part of your body weight.
Grab the pull-up bar with palms facing away from you.
Pull your body up until your chin is above the bar.
Lower yourself back to the starting position.
equipments: assisted pull-up machine or resistance bands

name: Lat Pulldown
instructions: Sit at the lat pulldown machine and grab the bar with a wide grip.
Pull the bar down to your chest, then slowly return to the starting position.

name: Barbell Row
instructions: Hold a barbell with a grip slightly wider than shoulder-width.
Bend at the hips and knees, keeping your back straight.
Pull the barbell to your lower chest, then lower it back to the starting position.

name: Dumbbell Row
instructions: Place one knee and hand on a bench for support.
Hold a dumbbell in the opposite hand.
Pull the dumbbell to your hip, then lower it back to the starting position.

name: T-Bar Row
instructions: Position yourself with feet shoulder-width apart and knees slightly bent.
Hold the T-bar handle with both hands.
Pull the handle towards your lower chest, then lower it back to the starting position.

name: Seated Cable Row
instructions: Sit at the cable row machine with feet braced against the footrests.
Grab the handle with both hands.
Pull the handle to your abdomen, then slowly return to the starting position.

name: Deadlift
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart and grip the barbell with hands just outside your knees.
Lift the barbell by straightening your hips and knees, keeping your back straight.
Lower the barbell back to the starting position.

name: Romanian Deadlift
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart and hold a barbell with hands just outside your thighs.
Lower the barbell by bending at the hips, keeping your back straight and knees slightly bent.
Lift the barbell back to the starting position.

name: Single-Arm Dumbbell Row
instructions: Place one knee and hand on a bench for support.
Hold a dumbbell in the opposite hand.
Pull the dumbbell to your hip, then lower it back to the starting position.

name: Face Pull
instructions: Set the pulley to the upper position on a cable machine.
Grab the rope attachment with both hands.
Pull the rope towards your face, keeping your elbows high, then return to the starting position.

name: Bent-Over Dumbbell Row
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in each hand.
Bend at the hips and knees, keeping your back straight.
Pull the dumbbells to your hips, then lower them back to the starting position.

name: Inverted Row
instructions: Set a barbell in a rack at waist height.
Lie underneath the bar and grab it with an overhand grip.
Pull your chest to the bar, then lower yourself back to the starting position.

name: Hyperextension
instructions: Lie face down on a hyperextension bench with your ankles secured.
Bend at the waist to lower your upper body, then raise it back to the starting position.

name: Barbell Bench Press
instructions: Lie on a bench with feet flat on the ground.
Lower the barbell to your chest, then push it back up to the starting position.

name: Dumbbell Bench Press
instructions: Lie on a bench with feet flat on the ground.
Lower the dumbbells to your chest, then push them back up to the starting position.

name: Incline Bench Press
instructions: Set the bench to an incline position.
Lie on the bench with feet flat on the ground.
Lower the barbell to your upper chest, then push it back up to the starting position.

name: Incline Dumbbell Press
instructions: Set the bench to an incline position.
Lie on the bench with feet flat on the ground.
Lower the dumbbells to your upper chest, then push them back up to the starting position.

name: Chest Fly
instructions: Lie on a bench with feet flat on the ground.
Hold dumbbells above your chest with arms slightly bent.
Lower the dumbbells out to the sides, then bring them back up to the starting position.

name: Cable Fly
instructions: Stand in the middle of a cable machine with handles in each hand.
Step forward to create tension on the cables.
Bring the handles together in front of your chest, then return to the starting position.

name: Push-Up
instructions: Start in a plank position with hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor, then push back up to the starting position.

name: Incline Push-Up
instructions: Place your hands on an elevated surface, such as a bench or step.
Lower your body until your chest nearly touches the surface, then push back up to the starting position.

name: Decline Bench Press
instructions: Set the bench to a decline position.
Lie on the bench with feet secured.
Lower the barbell to your lower chest, then push it back up to the starting position.

name: Decline Dumbbell Press
instructions: Set the bench to a decline position.
Lie on the bench with feet secured.
Lower the dumbbells to your lower chest, then push them back up to the starting position.

name: Pec Deck Machine
instructions: Sit on the machine with your back flat against the pad.
Place your forearms on the pads with elbows at a 90-degree angle.
Bring the pads together in front of your chest, then return to the starting position.

name: Chest Dip
instructions: Hold the parallel bars and lift your body up.
Lean slightly forward and lower your body until your elbows are at a 90-degree angle.
Push back up to the starting position.

name: Assisted Chest Dip
instructions: Use an assisted dip machine or resistance bands to support part of your body weight.
Hold the parallel bars and lift your body up.
Lean slightly forward and lower your body until your elbows are at a 90-degree angle.
Push back up to the starting position.
equipments: assisted dip machine or resistance bands

name: Machine Chest Press
instructions: Sit on the machine with your back flat against the pad.
Grip the handles and push them forward until your arms are fully extended.
Slowly return to the starting position.

name: Plank
instructions: Start in a push-up position with your forearms on the ground.
Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels.
Hold this position for the desired amount of time.

name: Side Plank
instructions: Lie on your side with your forearm on the ground.
Lift your hips to create a straight line from head to heels.
Hold this position for the desired amount of time.

name: Russian Twist
instructions: Sit on the ground with knees bent and feet flat.
Lean back slightly and lift your feet off the ground.
Hold a weight or medicine ball with both hands.
Twist your torso to the right, then to the left to complete one rep.

name: Bicycle Crunch
instructions: Lie on your back with hands behind your head and legs lifted.
Bring your right elbow to your left knee while extending your right leg.
Switch sides, bringing your left elbow to your right knee.

name: Leg Raise
instructions: Lie on your back with legs straight and hands at your sides.
Lift your legs towards the ceiling while keeping them straight.
Lower your legs back to the starting position without touching the ground.

name: Hanging Leg Raise
instructions: Hang from a pull-up bar with legs straight.
Lift your legs towards the ceiling while keeping them straight.
Lower your legs back to the starting position without swinging.

name: Mountain Climbers
instructions: Start in a push-up position.
Bring one knee towards your chest, then switch legs quickly.
Continue alternating legs in a running motion.

name: Ab Wheel Rollout
instructions: Kneel on the ground holding an ab wheel.
Roll the wheel forward while keeping your core tight.
Roll back to the starting position.

name: Sit-Up
instructions: Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Place your hands behind your head or across your chest.
Lift your upper body towards your knees.
Lower your upper body back to the starting position.

name: Crunch
instructions: Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Place your hands behind your head or across your chest.
Lift your shoulders off the ground towards your knees.
Lower your shoulders back to the starting position.

name: Flutter Kicks
instructions: Lie on your back with legs straight and hands at your sides.
Lift your legs a few inches off the ground.
Alternate kicking your legs up and down in a fluttering motion.

name: V-Up
instructions: Lie on your back with legs straight and arms extended overhead.
Lift your legs and upper body simultaneously to form a V shape.
Lower your legs and upper body back to the starting position.

name: Toe Touches
instructions: Lie on your back with legs straight and arms extended overhead.
Lift your legs towards the ceiling.
Reach your hands towards your toes, lifting your shoulders off the ground.
Lower your shoulders back to the starting position.

name: Hanging Knee Raise
instructions: Hang from a pull-up bar with legs straight.
Lift your knees towards your chest.
Lower your knees back to the starting position without swinging.

name: Cable Woodchopper
instructions: Stand next to a cable machine with the handle set to the highest position.
Grab the handle with both hands.
Pull the handle down and across your body in a chopping motion.
Return to the starting position.

name: Squat
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
Lower your body by bending your knees and hips.
Push through your heels to return to the starting position.

name: Goblet Squat
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart holding a dumbbell or kettlebell close to your chest.
Lower your body by bending your knees and hips.
Push through your heels to return to the starting position.

name: Lunge
instructions: Stand with feet together.
Step forward with one foot and lower your body until both knees are at 90-degree angles.
Push through your front heel to return to the starting position.

name: Walking Lunge
instructions: Stand with feet together holding a dumbbell in each hand.
Step forward with one foot and lower your body until both knees are at 90-degree angles.
Push through your front heel to step forward with the other foot.

name: Leg Press
instructions: Sit on the leg press machine with feet shoulder-width apart on the platform.
Lower the platform by bending your knees.
Push through your heels to return to the starting position.

name: Leg Curl
instructions: Lie face down on the leg curl machine with your ankles under the pads.
Curl your legs up towards your glutes.
Slowly lower your legs back to the starting position.

name: Seated Leg Curl
instructions: Sit on the leg curl machine with your ankles under the pads.
Curl your legs down towards the floor.
Slowly return your legs to the starting position.

name: Leg Extension
instructions: Sit on the leg extension machine with your ankles under the pads.
Extend your legs until they are straight.
Slowly lower your legs back to the starting position.

name: Romanian Deadlift
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart holding a barbell with hands just outside your thighs.
Lower the barbell by bending at the hips, keeping your back straight and knees slightly bent.
Lift the barbell back to the starting position.

name: Calf Raise
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
Raise your heels as high as possible, then lower them back to the starting position.

name: Seated Calf Raise
instructions: Sit on the calf raise machine with the balls of your feet on the platform.
Raise your heels as high as possible, then lower them back to the starting position.

name: Bulgarian Split Squat
instructions: Stand a few feet in front of a bench.
Place one foot on the bench behind you.
Lower your body by bending your front knee.
Push through your front heel to return to the starting position.

name: Step-Up
instructions: Stand in front of a bench or step holding a dumbbell in each hand.
Step onto the bench with one foot.
Push through your front heel to lift your body up.
Step back down with the same foot.

name: Glute Bridge
instructions: Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Lift your hips towards the ceiling by squeezing your glutes.
Lower your hips back to the starting position.

name: Hip Thrust
instructions: Sit on the ground with your upper back against a bench and a barbell over your hips.
Lift your hips towards the ceiling by squeezing your glutes.
Lower your hips back to the starting position.

name: Overhead Press
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart holding a barbell at shoulder height.
Press the barbell overhead until your arms are fully extended.
Lower the barbell back to shoulder height.

name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
instructions: Sit on a bench with back support holding a dumbbell in each hand at shoulder height.
Press the dumbbells overhead until your arms are fully extended.
Lower the dumbbells back to shoulder height.

name: Lateral Raise
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart holding a dumbbell in each hand at your sides.
Raise the dumbbells out to the sides until they are at shoulder height.
Lower the dumbbells back to your sides.

name: Front Raise
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart holding a dumbbell in each hand at your sides.
Raise the dumbbells in front of you until they are at shoulder height.
Lower the dumbbells back to your sides.

name: Rear Delt Fly
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart holding a dumbbell in each hand.
Bend at the hips and knees, keeping your back straight.
Raise the dumbbells out to the sides until they are at shoulder height.
Lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.

name: Arnold Press
instructions: Sit on a bench with back support holding a dumbbell in each hand at shoulder height with palms facing you.
Rotate your palms away from you as you press the dumbbells overhead.
Lower the dumbbells back to shoulder height with palms facing you.

name: Upright Row
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart holding a barbell with an overhand grip.
Pull the barbell to your chin, keeping your elbows high.
Lower the barbell back to the starting position.

name: Dumbbell Upright Row
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart holding a dumbbell in each hand.
Pull the dumbbells to your chin, keeping your elbows high.
Lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.

name: Cable Lateral Raise
instructions: Stand next to a cable machine with the handle set to the lowest position.
Grab the handle with the hand farthest from the machine.
Raise the handle out to the side until it is at shoulder height.
Lower the handle back to the starting position.

name: Cable Front Raise
instructions: Stand facing away from a cable machine with the handle set to the lowest position.
Grab the handle with one hand.
Raise the handle in front of you until it is at shoulder height.
Lower the handle back to the starting position.

name: Cable Rear Delt Fly
instructions: Stand facing a cable machine with the handles set to the lowest position.
Grab the handles with both hands and step back to create tension.
Raise the handles out to the sides until they are at shoulder height.
Lower the handles back to the starting position.

name: Face Pull
instructions: Set the pulley to the upper position on a cable machine.
Grab the rope attachment with both hands.
Pull the rope towards your face, keeping your elbows high, then return to the starting position.

name: Standing Military Press
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart holding a barbell at shoulder height.
Press the barbell overhead until your arms are fully extended.
Lower the barbell back to shoulder height.

name: Dumbbell Shrug
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart holding a dumbbell in each hand at your sides.
Raise your shoulders as high as possible, then lower them back to the starting position.

name: Barbell Shrug
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart holding a barbell with an overhand grip.
Raise your shoulders as high as possible, then lower them back to the starting position.
